title: Disintegration: Master Chief’s Co-Creator On Life After Halo, And Creating A New Sci-Fi World
description: Lucy James sits down with Marcus Lehto, Game Director of Disintegration, to discuss the game's story and world, and how he went from Bungie to putting together his own personal team.

title: Fiendish Gaming Trivia With GameSpot | Play For All Day 6
description:
Donate to Black Lives Matter: http://bit.ly/gs-blm
Donate to COVID-19 Direct Relief: http://bit.ly/gs-covid

Test your might against the quizmaster, Rob Handlery, as he puts together some fiendish rounds of gaming trivia, covering iconic game music, classic E3 moments, and more!

title: Hearthstone Felfire Festival Brings Major Content Updates And Pirates In Battlegrounds
description: Michael Higham sits down with Dave Kosak, principal narrative designer, and Conor Kou, game designer, to talk about the major updates and features coming to Hearthstone in the near future, including a new demon hunter hero.

title: PlayStation 5 - Official Future of Gaming Reveal Teaser Trailer
description:
Tune in June 11 at 1:00 PM (PDT) for first looks at PS5 games, reveals, and more.

#PS5 #PlayStation5 #TheFutureOfGaming

title: Guerrilla Collective - Black Voices In Gaming
description: The Guerrilla Collective highlights black voices in the gaming industry with an event dedicated exclusively to showcasing games created by Black developers, titles featuring Black protagonists, and conversations with these creators.
